name: Clin N NET Stomach
title: Clinical N
notes:
**Note 1:** Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS, in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in M (distant metastasis).

**Note 2:**  Hepatoduodenal nodes are regional for primaries of the lesser curvature of the stomach.  They are coded in M (distant metastasis) for all other subsites in this schema.

**Regional lymph nodes**

    Celiac
       Hepatic (excluding gastrohepatic) 
       Hepatoduodenal     
    Left gastric (superior gastric), NOS:
       Cardial
       Cardioesophageal
       Gastric, left
       Gastropancreatic, left
       Lesser curvature
       Lesser omental
       Paracardial
    Hepatoduodenal (for lesser curvature)  
    Nodule(s) in perigastric fat    
    Pancreaticosplenic (pancreaticolienal)
    Pancreaticoduodenal
    Perigastric, NOS
    Peripancreatic
    Right gastric (inferior gastric), NOS
       Gastrocolic
       Gastroduodenal
       Gastroepiploic (gastro-omental), right or NOS
       Gastrohepatic
       Greater curvature
       Greater omental
       Pyloric, NOS: infrapyloric, subpyloric, suprapyloric
    Splenic (lienal), NOS:
        Gastroepiploic (gastro-omental), left
        Splenic hilar
